citations.narrative:
There was no one available during business hours to allow APHIS Officials to enter and inspect the facilities,
property, records, and animals on12-Jul-17 at 10:30 AM.
The lab coordinator was contacted via phone twice and left voice messages The office door was locked and there
was no one to contact if the licensee was available. This report was also sent via email.
